output.sentences: Rubbing my back is a sure way to get me to relax at night.
Any male can be my hero as long as he can accomplish this one feat.
This male can be the pirate on my ship anytime as long as he can give a good back rub.
The male I choose to marry will be superman when it comes to massage.
If you can't give a good massage you may as well grow wings and fly away.
